text.0: agni erect hath shown enriching favour the flame goes forward to the gods assembly.
text.1: like carborne men the stones their path have chosen let the priest quickened celebrate our worship.
text.2: soft to the tread their sacred grass is scattered these go like kings amid the band around them.
text.3: at the folks early call on night and morningvāyu and pūṣan with his team to bless us.
text.4: here on their path the noble gods proceeded in the wide firmament the beauteous decked them.
text.5: bend your way hither ye who travel widely hear this our envoy who hath gone to meet you.
text.6: for they are holy aids at sacrifices all gods approach the place of congregation.
text.7: bring these desirous to our worship agni swift the nisatyas bhaga and purandhi.
text.8: agni to these mens hymns from earth from heaven bring mitra varuṇa indra and agni.
text.9: and aryaman and aditi and viṣṇu sarasvatī be joyful and the maruts.
text.10: even as the holy wish the gift is offered may he unsated come when men desire him.
text.11: give neverfailing everconquering riches with gods for our allies may we be victors.
text.12: now have both worlds been praised by the vasisthas and holy mitra varuṇa and agni.
text.13: may they bright deities make our song supremest preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
